content.rendered:
GEOKC Guests

(One time life event and enjoyment of free yogic meal)
A warm welcome to those participants who are our guests forever

Areas of Sponsorship ♦ Guest Registration Area ♦ Guest Pictures/Videos

Areas of Sponsorship

  • Singing at Satsang
  • Discourse on Hinduism
  • Discourse on Vaishnavism
  • Discourse on Holy Gita
  • Join GEOKC Events

Guest Registration Area

Guest Registration Form 
Guest Flier (PDF)
